title: INSPIRE, Volume 1
description: Dr Joe holds a Bachelor of Science degree and is a Doctor of Chiropractic. His post graduate training includes the fields of neuroscience and neuroplasticity, quantitative electroencephalogram (QEEG) measurements, epigenetics, mind-body medicine, and brain/heart coherence.
cleaned_text: INSPIRE, Volume 1 Ten Tracks to master the breath. Includes bonus teaching video "Pulling the Mind Out of the Body." Walk for the World Join the Live Global Walking Meditation September 23, 2023 at 10a.m. EDT Changing Boxes Meditation - Short Version Create a new personal reality. Morning and Evening Meditations, Volume 2 One Day. One Lifetime. INSPIRE, Volume 1 Ten Tracks to master the breath. Includes bonus teaching video "Pulling the Mind Out of the Body." Walk for the World Join the Live Global Walking Meditation September 23, 2023 at 10a.m. EDT People Changing People Common people doing the uncommon ... engaging with the mystical ... and becoming supernatural. We embrace this work because we're curious, open-hearted, supportive, inspired, and committed. We understand by changing ourselves, we change our lives. Stepping into the unknown, together - unifying as one heart and mind - we also create real, lasting change in the world. Featured Products Upcoming Retreats Read Dr Joe's Blog Every two weeks, Dr Joe answers your questions, introduces new material, simplifies complex ideas, and explains foundational teachings of the work. Become a member to join us for the next Dr Joe Live. Once you've joined, your Subscriptions page provides access to our complete library of past Dr Joe Live conversations, along with instructions to ask or submit a question. We look forward to having you with us.
